All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
gears.io
 
gears.sidescroller.gui
 
gears.sidescroller.gui.console
This package provides classes relevant to a console component that allows users to enter text commands, much like BASH
gears.sidescroller.gui.console.commands
 
gears.sidescroller.gui.level
This package is responsible for the level-playing GUI
gears.sidescroller.loader
This package is responsible for loading and storing world information
gears.sidescroller.start
 
gears.sidescroller.util
 
gears.sidescroller.world.areas
The areas package contain classes relevant to Areas: defining, randomly generating, and serializing them.
gears.sidescroller.world.core
The core package contains classes and interfaces used by multiple different sub-packages of world.
gears.sidescroller.world.entities
The entities package handles the sentient beings which occupy the game world.
gears.sidescroller.world.items
This package contains classes relevant to items, which are elements of the game world which a Player can pick up and use.
gears.sidescroller.world.levels
The levels package simply contains classes relevant to Levels: defining, generating, and serializing them.
gears.sidescroller.world.machines
Machines are interactive components of the game world.
gears.sidescroller.world.structures
Structures are matrices of tiles which can be inserted into a TileMap.
gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps
The tileMaps package is responsible for the TileMap background of Areas.
gears.sidescroller.world.tiles
Tiles serves as part of the static environment of the game world.
